title: 📢 Sunday Service Update
message: Join us this Sunday for a special Thanksgiving Service at **9 AM**. Everyone is welcome!

title: ⏳ Midweek Prayer Meeting
message: Our weekly prayer session holds every Wednesday at **9 AM**. Come and be blessed!

title: 🎶 Worship Night
message: A night of deep worship and praise is happening this Friday at **10 PM**. Don’t miss it!
